6th Hero Youth Festival 1998
Hogeschool 's-Hertogenbosch, Netherlands
4-11 January 1998


Final
Norway 69 52 121 
Netherlands 29 11 40 

SemiFinals
Norway 36 33 69 
Ireland 0 22 22 
     
Netherlands A 32 27 59 
Portugal 13 25 38 

Round Robin
